mapper.select: select count(id) from user where name = #{name}
select password from user where name = #{name}
select isManager,isBaned from user where name = #{name}
mapper.update: update user set isBaned=#{isBaned} where name = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, password, isManager, isBaned) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{isManager}, #{isBaned})
